column2: I have major disagreements with my opponent about these issues and others that will be before the Supreme Court.
column4: Donald Trump is "against marriage equality. He wants to go back."

column2: I have major disagreements with my opponent about these issues and others that will be before the Supreme Court.
column4: Says Donald Trump has "changed his mind" on abortion.

column2: But I feel that at this point in our country's history, it is important that we not reverse marriage equality, that we not reverse Roe v. Wade, that we stand up against Citizens United, we stand up for the rights of people in the workplace, that we stand up and basically say The Supreme Court should represent all of us.
column4: Donald Trump is "against marriage equality. He wants to go back."

column2: I believe if my opponent should win this race, which I truly don't think will happen, we will have a Second Amendment which will be a very, very small replica of what it is right now.
column4: SaysHillary Clinton "wants to abolish the Second Amendment."

column2: And what I was saying that you referenced, Chris, was that I disagreed with the way the court applied the Second Amendment in that case, because what the District of Columbia was trying to do was to protect toddlers from guns and so they wanted people with guns to safely store them.
column4: What the District of Columbia was trying to do(with its handgun ban) was to protect toddlers from guns.

column2: And so when I think about what we need to do, we have 33,000 people a year who die from guns.
column4: We have 33,000 people a year who die from guns.

column2: And, indeed, he said women should be punished, that there should be some form of punishment for women who obtain abortions.
column4: Says Donald Trump "said a woman should be punished for exercising her right to choose."

column2: Hillary wants to give amnesty.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton "wants to have open borders."

column2: She wants to have open borders.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton "wants to have open borders."

column2: All of the problems  the single biggest problem is heroin that pours across our southern border.
column4: Heroin .. pours across our southern borders.

column2: It's just pouring and destroying their youth.
column4: Heroin .. pours across our southern borders.

column2: He said as recently as a few weeks ago in Phoenix that every undocumented person would be subject to deportation.
column4: Says Donald Trump "saidas recently as a few weeks ago in Phoenix that every undocumented person would be subject to deportation."

column2: Hillary Clinton wanted the wall.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton "wanted the wall."

column2: Hillary Clinton fought for the wall in 2006 or thereabouts.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton "wanted the wall."

column2: He used undocumented labor to build the Trump Tower.
column4: Says Donald Trump "used undocumented labor to build the Trump Tower."

column2: She wants 550 percent more people than Barack Obama, and he has thousands and thousands of people.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton "wants to increase Syrian refugees to this country by 550 percent."

column2: I don't know Putin.
column4: On whether hes had a relationship with Vladimir Putin.

column2: that the Russians have engaged in cyberattacks against the United States of America, that you encouraged espionage against our people, that you are willing to spout the Putin line, sign up for his wish list, break up NATO, do whatever he wants to do, and that you continue to get help from him, because he has a very clear favorite in this race.
column4: Says Donald Trump "publicly invited Putin to hack into Americans (emails)."

column2: We have 17  17 intelligence agencies, civilian and military, who have all concluded that these espionage attacks, these cyberattacks, come from the highest levels of the Kremlin and they are designed to influence our election.
column4: We have 17 intelligence agencies, civilian and military, who have all concluded that these espionage attacks, these cyberattacks, come from the highest levels of the Kremlin, and they are designed to influence our election.

column2: advocated more countries getting them, Japan, Korea, even Saudi Arabia.
column4: Says Donald Trump "never said that" more nations should get nuclear weapons.

column2: I want us to have the biggest jobs program since World War II, jobs in infrastructure and advanced manufacturing.
column4: Says her campaign platform includes the "biggest investment in new, goodpaying jobs since World War II."

column2: Because his whole plan is to cut taxes, to give the biggest tax breaks ever to the wealthy and to corporations, adding $20 trillion to our debt, and causing the kind of dislocation that we have seen before, because it truly will be trickledown economics on steroids.
column4: Says Donald Trumps tax plan gives the wealthy and corporations "more than the Bush tax cuts by at least a factor of two."

column2: Well, first of all, before I start on my plan, her plan is going to raise taxes and even double your taxes.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton's "plan is going to raise taxes and even double your taxes."

column2: She lied when she said she didn't call it the gold standard in one of the debates.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton called the TransPacific Partnership "the gold standard. You called it the gold standard of trade deals. You said its the finest deal youve ever seen."

column2: She did call it the gold standard.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton called the TransPacific Partnership "the gold standard. You called it the gold standard of trade deals. You said its the finest deal youve ever seen."

column2: Just like when you ran the State Department, $6 billion was missing.
column4: When Hillary Clinton "ran the State Department, $6 billion was missing. How do you miss $6 billion? You ran the State Department, $6 billion was either stolen  they don't know."

column2: You ran the State Department, $6 billion was either stolen.
column4: When Hillary Clinton "ran the State Department, $6 billion was missing. How do you miss $6 billion? You ran the State Department, $6 billion was either stolen  they don't know."

column2: It's gone, $6 billion.
column4: When Hillary Clinton "ran the State Department, $6 billion was missing. How do you miss $6 billion? You ran the State Department, $6 billion was either stolen  they don't know."

column2: He was getting sued by the Justice Department for racial discrimination in his apartment buildings.
column4: Says Donald Trump "started his career back in 1973 being sued by the Justice Department for racial discrimination because he would not rent apartments in one of his developments to AfricanAmericans."

column2: She gave us ISIS, because her and Obama created this huge vacuum, and a small group came out of that huge vacuum because when  we should never have been in Iraq, but once we were there, we should have never got out the way they wanted to get out.
column4: Hillary Clinton invented ISIS with her stupid policies. She is responsible for ISIS.

column2: She gave us ISIS as sure as you are sitting there.
column4: Hillary Clinton invented ISIS with her stupid policies. She is responsible for ISIS.

column2: And since then, as we all know, nine women have come forward and have said that you either groped them or kissed them without their consent.
column4: The stories from women saying he groped or forced himself on them "largely have been debunked."

column2: Well, first of all, those stories have been largely debunked.
column4: The stories from women saying he groped or forced himself on them "largely have been debunked."

column2: But I will tell you what isn't fictionalized are her emails, where she destroyed 33,000 emails criminally, criminally, after getting a subpoena from the United States Congress.
column4: You (Hillary Clinton) get a subpoena, and after getting the subpoena you delete 33,000 emails.

column2: But he also went after a disabled reporter, mocked and mimicked him on national television.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton is "wrong" to say he mocked a disabled reporter.

column2: Wrong.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton is "wrong" to say he mocked a disabled reporter.

column2: But just briefly, the Clinton Foundation made it possible for 11 million people around the world with HIVAIDS to afford treatment, and that's about half all the people in the world who are getting treatment.
column4: Nine million people have lowercost HIVAIDS medicine because of the work of the Clinton Foundation and my husband.

column2: Saudi Arabia giving $25 million, Qatar, all of these countries.
column4: The Clintons' foundation took millions from foreign governments including United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia.

column2: Saudi Arabia giving $25 million, Qatar, all of these countries.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton has been given tens of millions of dollars by countries that "treat women horribly ...and countries that kill gays."

column2: These are people that kill women and treat women horribly.
column4: Says Hillary Clinton has been given tens of millions of dollars by countries that "treat women horribly ...and countries that kill gays."

column2: So I'd like to ask you right now, why don't you give back the money that you've taken from certain countries that treat certain groups of people so horribly?
column4: The Clintons' foundation took millions from foreign governments including United Arab Emirates and Saudi Arabia.

column2: So I'd like to ask you right now, why don't you give back the money that you've taken from certain countries that treat certain groups of people so horribly?
column4: Says Hillary Clinton has been given tens of millions of dollars by countries that "treat women horribly ...and countries that kill gays."

column2: And I'd be happy to compare what we do with the Trump Foundation, which took money from other people and bought a six foot portrait of Donald.
column4: Says Donald Trump'sfoundation "took money other people gave to his charity and then bought a sixfoottall painting of himself."

column2: He is the first candidate ever to run for president in the last 40plus years who has not released his tax returns, so everything he says about charity or anything else, we can't prove it.
column4: Says that except for Donald Trump, "every other major party nominee" for the past 40 years has released their tax returns.

column2: And all of her donors  just about all of them  I know Buffett took hundreds of millions of dollars, Soros, George Soros, took hundreds of millions of dollars...
column4: Many of (Hillary Clinton's) friends took bigger deductions (than me). Warren Buffett took a massive deduction. (George) Soros, who is a friend of hers, took a massive deduction.

column2: If you look  excuse me, Chris  if you look at your voter rolls, you will see millions of people that are registered to vote  millions, this isn't coming from me  this is coming from Pew Report and other places  millions of people that are registered to vote that shouldn't be registered to vote.
column4: Of course, there is large scale voter fraud happening on and before election day.

column2: There was even a time when he didn't get an Emmy for his TV program three years in a row and he started tweeting that the Emmys were rigged against him.
column4: There was even a time when (Donald Trump) didn't get an Emmy for his TV program three years in a row and he started tweeting that the Emmys were rigged.

column2: Well, you know, once again, Donald is implying that he didn't support the invasion of Iraq.
column4: I was totally against the war in Iraq.

column2: I said it was a mistake.
column4: I was totally against the war in Iraq.

column2: I've said that years ago.
column4: I was totally against the war in Iraq.

column2: He has consistently denied what is...
column4: I was totally against the war in Iraq.

column2: We gave them $150 billion back.
column4: Under the Iran nuclear deal, "we give them $150 billion, we get nothing."

column2: It's  the premiums are going up 60 percent, 70 percent, 80 percent.
column4: Because of Obamacare "peoples premiums ...are going up 35, 45, 55 percent."

column2: We take care of illegal immigrants, people that come into the country illegally, better than we take care of our vets.
column4: Our veterans, in many cases, are being treated worse than illegal immigrants.
